resources.string: Smart boost allows an app to utilise the CPU and GPU without any limitations. This will consume more battery power and disable other apps running in the background.
Free up space by deleting thumbnails, uninstalled apks and cache.
View and stop the activities running in the background.
Scan and remove threats and keep your phone safe!
You decide which apps can use your mobile data and WiFi!
Your phone will predict your needs based on your usage. Access the menu of your own custom shortcuts. Gestures gives you various ways to control your phone.
Go to the settings page of Screen recorder.
Open AI Floating Touch, App Traffic Control, Junk Cleaner, Screen Recorder Settings, Smart Boost, Task Manager and Virus Scanner from here.
